name: Mowin' & Throwin'
description: Wreck your neighbor's yard by using lawn gnomes to throw rocks, fertilizer bags, and more! Race around in a nitro boosted tank and blast unsuspecting opponents! Great to play with friends or people you only sort of like.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Quad-core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: 2 PC Compatible Controllers Required!
